auth.description: Regulatory management app for document control and compliance of pharmaceutical Health Registration applications before ARCSA.

A-01.title: GMP Certificate
A-01.hint: Upload the current Good Manufacturing Practices certificate. May include annexes if applicable.
A-01.multiHint: You can upload: Main GMP certificate + Annexes or additional scopes
A-01.evaluates:
EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Certificate validity (not expired)
‚Ä¢ Recognized issuing health authority
‚Ä¢ Pharmaceutical forms covered
‚Ä¢ Manufacturer and address match
‚Ä¢ Annexes consistency

A-02.title: CPP / Free Sale Certificate
A-02.hint: Upload the Certificate of Pharmaceutical Product (WHO) or Free Sale Certificate from country of origin.
A-02.evaluates:
EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Certificate validity
‚Ä¢ Specific product mentioned
‚Ä¢ Country of origin and issuing authority
‚Ä¢ Marketing status

A-03.title: Holder Declaration
A-03.hint: Upload the signed declaration about the international regulatory status of the product.
A-03.evaluates:
EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Legal representative signature
‚Ä¢ Countries where registered/rejected/withdrawn
‚Ä¢ Withdrawal reasons (if applicable)
‚Ä¢ International safety alerts

A-04.title: Legal Power of Attorney
A-04.hint: Upload the notarized power of attorney authorizing procedures before ARCSA Ecuador.
A-04.evaluates:
EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Valid notarized power
‚Ä¢ Explicit authorization for ARCSA
‚Ä¢ Power validity
‚Ä¢ Legal representative identification

B-01.title: Development & Manufacturing
B-01.hint: Folder with product development documents. You can upload multiple files.
B-01.multiHint:
üìÅ This folder contains:
‚Ä¢ B-01.1 Product Description
‚Ä¢ B-01.2 Manufacturing Process
‚Ä¢ B-01.3 Quali-Quantitative Formula
‚Ä¢ B-01.4 In-Process Controls (IPC)
‚Ä¢ B-01.5 Process Flowchart
‚Ä¢ B-01.6 Overages / Losses
B-01.evaluates:
üîç EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Complete development documentation
‚Ä¢ Consistency between sub-documents
‚Ä¢ Process traceability

B-01-1.title: Product Description
B-01-1.hint: Physical, chemical and pharmaceutical description of the finished product.
B-01-1.evaluates:
üîç EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Physical description (color, shape, odor)
‚Ä¢ Chemical characteristics
‚Ä¢ Pharmaceutical properties

B-01-2.title: Manufacturing Process
B-01-2.evaluates:
üîç EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Complete sequence of operations
‚Ä¢ Critical parameters (time, temperature)
‚Ä¢ Equipment used

B-01-3.title: Quali-Quantitative Formula
B-01-3.hint: Complete composition with quantities of each active ingredient and excipient.
B-01-3.evaluates:
üîç EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ All APIs with exact quantities
‚Ä¢ All excipients with function
‚Ä¢ Colorants and preservatives

B-01-4.title: In-Process Controls (IPC)
B-01-4.hint: Control parameters and limits during the manufacturing process.
B-01-4.evaluates:
üîç EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Control points defined
‚Ä¢ Acceptance limits
‚Ä¢ Sampling frequency

B-01-5.title: Process Flowchart
B-01-5.hint: Visual diagram of the manufacturing process flow.
B-01-5.evaluates:
üîç EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Clear visual representation
‚Ä¢ All stages included
‚Ä¢ Control points marked

B-01-6.title: Overages / Losses
B-01-6.hint: Justification for overdosing or compensation for process losses.
B-01-6.evaluates:
üîç EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Technical justification for overage
‚Ä¢ Compensation calculations

B-02.title: Raw Materials / API CoA
B-02.hint: Upload ONE file for EACH raw material.
B-02.multiHint:
Must include:
‚Ä¢ 1 CoA for each Active Pharmaceutical Ingredient (API)
‚Ä¢ 1 CoA for each declared Colorant
‚Ä¢ 1 CoA for each declared Preservative
‚Ä¢ CoA for critical excipients (optional)
B-02.evaluates:
EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ CoA present for EACH API from B-04
‚Ä¢ CoA for each colorant from B-06
‚Ä¢ CoA for each preservative
‚Ä¢ Manufacturer/supplier identified
‚Ä¢ Specifications compliance
‚Ä¢ Analysis validity

B-03.title: Quality Specifications
B-03.hint: Upload the finished product specifications with limits for each parameter.
B-03.evaluates:
EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Parameters for EACH API
‚Ä¢ Assay limits consistent with B-04
‚Ä¢ Physical parameters per dosage form
‚Ä¢ Impurity/degradant limits
‚Ä¢ Pharmacopoeia reference

B-04.title: Qualitative-Quantitative Formula
B-04.hint: Upload the complete formula with all APIs, excipients, colorants and preservatives.
B-04.evaluates:
EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Complete list of APIs with quantities
‚Ä¢ Equivalences (salts/hydrates)
‚Ä¢ Excipients with declared function
‚Ä¢ Colorants and preservatives
‚Ä¢ Consistency with B-02 and B-06

B-05.title: Formula Justification
B-05.hint: Upload the justification for each excipient and the combination (if applicable).
B-05.evaluates:
EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Justification for each excipient
‚Ä¢ Combination justification (FDC)
‚Ä¢ Dosage form justification
‚Ä¢ Bibliographic references

B-06.title: Excipients Declaration
B-06.hint: Upload the declaration of permitted excipients, colorants and preservatives.
B-06.evaluates:
EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ List of excipients with function
‚Ä¢ Colorants permitted by regulation
‚Ä¢ Preservatives and justification
‚Ä¢ Consistency with B-04

B-07.title: Manufacturing Process
B-07.multiHint:
May include:
‚Ä¢ Narrative process description
‚Ä¢ Relevant SOPs (granulation, mixing, etc.)
B-07.evaluates:
EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Critical stages identified
‚Ä¢ Process parameters (T¬∞, time)
‚Ä¢ In-process controls
‚Ä¢ Consistency with B-08

B-08.title: Process Flowchart
B-08.hint: Upload the manufacturing process flow diagram.
B-08.multiHint:
May include:
‚Ä¢ General flowchart
‚Ä¢ Flowcharts by area (weighing, production, packaging)
B-08.evaluates:
EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Clear and complete flowchart
‚Ä¢ Consistency with B-07
‚Ä¢ Control points identified
‚Ä¢ Input/output materials

B-09.title: Analytical Methodology
B-09.hint: Upload analytical methods and validation reports.
B-09.multiHint:
Must include for each API:
‚Ä¢ Identification method
‚Ä¢ Assay method
‚Ä¢ Impurities method (if applicable)
‚Ä¢ Validation reports
B-09.evaluates:
EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ ID + Assay method for each API
‚Ä¢ Analytical technique (HPLC, UV, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Validation status
‚Ä¢ Parameters: accuracy, precision, linearity
‚Ä¢ Consistency with B-01 and B-03

B-10.title: Batch Code
B-10.hint: Upload the SOP for batch code numbering and structure.
B-10.evaluates:
EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Code structure explained
‚Ä¢ Traceability guaranteed
‚Ä¢ Consistency with batches in other documents

B-11.title: Primary/Secondary Packaging
B-11.hint: Upload the description and specifications of packaging materials.
B-11.evaluates:
EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Packaging materials described
‚Ä¢ Material specifications
‚Ä¢ Product compatibility
‚Ä¢ Consistency with C-01 (stability)

C-01.title: Stability Studies
C-01.multiHint:
Must include:
‚Ä¢ Accelerated stability (minimum)
‚Ä¢ Long-term stability (recommended)
‚Ä¢ ONE file per batch/condition
‚Ä¢ Each API evaluated individually
C-01.evaluates:
EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Type: accelerated/long-term
‚Ä¢ Conditions (T¬∞, humidity)
‚Ä¢ EACH API evaluated per timepoint
‚Ä¢ Batches consistent with B-01
‚Ä¢ Shelf life support from C-02
‚Ä¢ Trends and results

C-02.title: Protocol and Shelf Life
C-02.hint: Upload the stability protocol and proposed shelf life conclusion.
C-02.evaluates:
EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Defined protocol
‚Ä¢ Shelf life justified by C-01
‚Ä¢ Storage conditions
‚Ä¢ Consistency with labels C-05

C-03.title: Chromatograms / Records
C-03.multiHint:
Must include:
‚Ä¢ Assay chromatograms for each API
‚Ä¢ Impurity chromatograms
‚Ä¢ Dissolution records (if applicable)
‚Ä¢ ONE file per analysis type
C-03.evaluates:
EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Chromatograms for each API
‚Ä¢ Methods consistent with B-09
‚Ä¢ Batches traceable to B-01 and C-01
‚Ä¢ Analysis date
‚Ä¢ Integration and results

C-04.title: Clinical/Pharmacological Support
C-04.hint: Upload bibliography and efficacy support for the product.
C-04.evaluates:
EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Supporting bibliography
‚Ä¢ Efficacy justification
‚Ä¢ Combination justification (FDC)
‚Ä¢ References to official guidelines

C-05.title: Labels
C-05.multiHint:
Must include:
‚Ä¢ Primary label (immediate container)
‚Ä¢ Secondary label (box/carton)
‚Ä¢ Package insert or leaflet
‚Ä¢ One for each commercial presentation
C-05.evaluates:
EVALUATED:
‚Ä¢ Primary + Secondary + Insert present
‚Ä¢ Composition = B-04
‚Ä¢ Shelf life = C-02
‚Ä¢ Storage conditions = C-01
‚Ä¢ Manufacturer = A-01
‚Ä¢ All presentations covered
